entry.string: Further instructions for registering have been sent to the email you provided. Please take a moment and read the instructions. If you have a question, or didn't receive your instructions please contact the
entry.translation: Foorzeer instroocshuns fur regeestering hefe-a beee sent tu zee imeeel yuoo prufeeded. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a teke-a a mument und reed zee instroocshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff yuoo hefe-a a qooesshun, oor deedn't receeefe-a yuoor instroocshuns pleese-a cuntect zee
